title: FS:  T3 Art Fromme (Ad Back) PSA A **SOLD**
author: rsdill2

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Art Fromme (Ad Back) PSA A **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
I'm not certain about the 'A' grade.  I assume it has something to do with the mark at the top middle but can't be sure.  My guess is it was an attempt to erase a mark.

Anyway, solid eye appeal and the nice looking ad back variation.

$old

I'll take it per our PMs.

[quote name="Bliggity" post=1470550]I'll take it per our PMs.[/QUOTE]

Payment received.   I'll send it tomorrow, thanks Dan.
